original_title: ノーパン妻 週末は不倫狂い
overview: Housewife Atsuko wanted to become a novelist and become an independent woman. So, while receiving the advice of my husband, I started to write a novel about a friend's affair. The world of novels written by Atsuko is visualized and progresses in parallel with reality.
title: Nôpan tsuma: Shûmatsu wa furin gurui
